title: 111. What I Didn't Know About Setting Boundaries
itunes:title: What I Didn't Know About Setting Boundaries
description:
In this episode of The Self Love Fix Podcast, I’m sharing ALL the things I wish I knew about boundary setting. I hope that these are points you can resonate with and maybe even relate to. I know that coming to these realizations is what truly helped me step into confidence when it comes to setting boundaries. So be sure to listen to the full episode for all the details! 

Here are a few points I cover: 

  • If you’ve ever felt so strongly about setting a boundary, but find yourself struggling to follow through with vocalizing it when the moment comes, this is why...
  • I get you and I understand you, I’ve been there too. 
  • A breakdown of fight flight freeze fawn.
  • The impacts of your upbringing when it comes to boundary setting.

I hope that sharing these points I wish I knew about boundary setting help you overcome any fears or hesitation when it comes to setting your own. Remember, you are doing the best you can at any given moment! Don’t be so hard on yourself.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

Make sure you pre-enroll for the Self Love Fix Collective membership here!
